properties.name: jira.automater.interval.cron
properties.description: The cron time at which the jira-automater tool runs. This is mainly to specify at which the notifications are sent to the email recepients

properties.name: jira.automater.interval.initialDelay
properties.description: The initial delay before which the first execution is triggered.

properties.name: spring.mail.bcc
properties.description: A comma seperated list of mail IDs to whom all the mails should be BCCd to
